markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twin Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=4796) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=57) (Level 6), [Dual-Weapon Warrior](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=247) (Level 6), [Avenger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=282) (Level 6)

**Requirements**
You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand

</column>

---

You use your two weapons to parry attacks. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn, or a +2 circumstance bonus if either weapon has the parry trait. You lose this circumstance bonus if you no longer meet this feat’s requirement.

<title level="2">Twin Parry leads to...</title>
[Twinned Defense (Fighter)](/Feats.aspx?ID=4853)
name: Twin Parry
requirement: You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand
requirement_markdown: You are wielding two melee weapons, one in each hand
